settings.custom_liquid:
The {{ product.title }}s are precision die cut for a clean look and made to withstand mother nature's harshest conditions. Available in two sizes, or choose the 3-pack for a discount.

  • Weatherproof: Made from thick vinyl and UV resistant inks to survive the dishwasher, I-70, or an epic pow day.
  • Official Logo: Avoid cheap knock-offs, ours is an officially licensed {{ product.metafields.custom.mountain.value }} logo.
  • Made in the USA: Proudly made in an American facility by experts using the most advanced technology.
  • Easy Application: Bubbleless adhesion{{ product.metafields.custom.sticker_peel_tabs }} and residue-free glues for a clean removal.
  • Available in Three Options: {% for variant in product.variants %} {% if variant.metafields.custom.sticker_width %} {% endif %} {% endfor %}
    {{ variant.title }}: Measures {{ variant.metafields.custom.sticker_width.value }}ches wide x {{ variant.metafields.custom.sticker_height.value }}ches tall.
    3-Pack: Includes two (2) medium and one (1) large stickers.

settings.title: {{ product.metafields.custom.mountain | metafield_text }} Resort Logo Sticker
settings.text:
Elevate your gear with the official {{ product.title }} —whether it’s your water bottle, laptop, skis, or car, this premium decal is made to endure every adventure. Printed on high-quality 3M™ Scotchcal™ vinyl, these stickers feature a bubble-free, permanent adhesive that holds tight but removes cleanly when needed. The thick UV-protective laminate ensures a crisp, fade-resistant design that can withstand years of sun, snow, and rain.

Proudly made in the USA with advanced printing technology, these resort stickers are the perfect way to represent your love for {{ product.metafields.custom.mountain | metafield_text }}. Get yours today and stick with our gauranteed quality.
